How to Use Section 1. If you double clicked to grid character item you can see more information about that character "2.You can create widget like that. We strongly recommend you to use just one widget. Due to the power consumption." 3.Widget have relative layout you can change like this. But recommended sizes are 2x2 and 4x2.
